com.google.android.material.textview.Mat.android:text: The main photo is how you appear to others on the swipe view
Make it easy for others to get a sense of who you are

com.google.android.material.textfield.Te.android:hint: Share few words about yourself, your interests, and what you are looking in a connection

com.google.android.material.textview.Mat.android:text: Most People also want to know
Adding your interest is a great way to find like-minded connections
